mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hardcastle, S. W. to Herman J. Doepner regarding the enclosed; 02 of 04
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 1-40--Scrapbook 1Hardcastle, S. W. to Herman J. Doepner regarding a list of enclosed materials, of which one is missing. Enclosed: "Signs Manual, Man and His Finger Print", by John Moylan, The Times, Mon 01/09/1933.; 2 pages; DF 1212
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
Herschel, William, Sir, 17381822
